33 NoFocusIndicator,
34
39 CanvasFocusIndicator,
40
46 ItemFocusIndicator
47 };
48

56 FocusIndicator focusIndicator() const;
57

60
61 protected:

63 const QWidget* canvasWidget() const;
64

76
77 private:
78 Q_DISABLE_COPY(QwtPlotAbstractCanvas)
79
